about_the_game:
This Modern themed package can be used to illustrate scavenger and survivor Female characters after the collapsion of civilization. The images can be used to visualize life after any kind of catastrophe.
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.

Content usable by all Season #2 Female characters:
- 3 skins
- 5 colourable hairs
- 5 hair presets
- 3 hats with hair
- 18 boots
- 1 full set of clothes
- 2 loinclothes
- 11 pants
- 1 suit
- 14 tops
- 7 underwear

- 6 armguards
- 1 chest item
- 1 cloak
- 1 coat
- 2 headwears
- 2 thigh items
- 1 tights
- 2 waist items
- 5 left-handed weapons
- 14 right-handed weapons

Additional content available to all packs:
- 5 backgrounds
- 3 companions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1370 x 770 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1440 pixels or higher desktop resolution
